website_summaries.verdict: Available in a variety of colorways, the Frye Brett Low offers a combination of retro style and sporty vibe. It has a versatile design that can look great with business and casual wear. With its trendy design, it can positively turn heads around. As fashionable as it is, the Frye Brett Low did not forget to deliver the comfort that users need to enjoy their day. Just one note, people with wide feet are suggested to size at least a half up to ensure satisfaction.
pros: The Frye Brett Low is an extremely comfortable sneaker perfect for prolonged walking according to a significant number of wearers
A handful of customers have praised the shoe’s stylish and fashionable design
Among the Frye sneakers, the Frye Brett Low is built with a high-quality leather upper that provides durability, as a lot of purchasers have pointed out
Several patrons have mentioned that this low-top shoe has a versatile silhouette perfect for business and casual wear
A couple of users have praised the Frye Brett Low shoe’s soft leather upper
This footwear is sold with two sets of shoelaces that have impressed some buyers
It comes with leather and waxed laces
A few elated users have shared that they receive compliments whenever they wear the Frye Brett Low
cons: The Frye Brett Low has a poor sole construction, several testers have muttered
The sole wears quickly, separating from the base of the shoe
Some users with wide feet have complained that it hurts their toe when walking because it fits tight on the toe area
It is recommended to size at least a half up
A couple of reviewers have mentioned that the leather is a bit stiff at first

customer_reviews.title: breaking up after very light use
customer_reviews.text: These are not cheap but after very light use (not my primary pair) but the sole is disconnecting from the top on both shows. Very dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Inbal Lev

customer_reviews.title: Frye, you have betrayed me for the last time!
customer_reviews.text: Why don't I listen to reviewers? So many people chimed in and said that the soles on these things have the adhesive strength of a philanderer on a two-week business trip. Guess what, my lovelies? Two-weeks into my ownership with some light mall walking in these bad boys and the sole started separating from the uppers. I've kept wearing them, now at 8 months, but I've had to use contact cement to try to keep the soles from looking super sloppy. Still, they just don't look great--almost as if some Chinese sweatshop kids put them together. Probably because they did. Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel F. Stolpe

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soft leather. These shoes are made to look as if they are already broken in with a used look. Material is not distressed or scuffed but they add some random black markings throughout which gives it a used look. Well done and a nice look for a casual relaxed feel. If you are someone who hates a "dirty" white shoe than choose a different Frye style. Frye Walker tennis shoe line has an awesome solid white shoe. Has a consistent white finish. Fits very well and extra soft feel. An amazing shoe too.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl F.

customer_reviews.title: Low Fashion as Low Quality - Down Graded
customer_reviews.text: These are made in China and is not the same quality as the "Walker Low Lace", and they are much Lower quality in material, specially the inter-layer. Updated with pics...after like 1 month of 30% used.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Kwong

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the leather. Top notch craftsmanship and the color is great. The fit is prefect out of the box. Did a lot of walking for 8 hours straight. Still felt comfortable at the end of the day. But think I will need some inserts at some point. But I have no problem with that. I'm not crazy about leather laces but that can easily be rectified when needed. They did come with white wax covered laces to change up the look. These are my first leather fashion sneakers and I'm pretty impressed. The price is great for what you're getting. Totally worth every penny. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Luis D.

customer_reviews.title: Look good, but not super durable
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the appearance while they were new. I wore these to work most days for almost a year. The bottom white section is separating from the base of the shoe. The white section is also also fraying quite a bit and are overdue for replacement. So note that these are not the most durable shoes, but I've also seen worse.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable and very stylish
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and very stylish. I have recieved several compliments on them. I had to go up a half size because I have a wide foot. I usually wear 9.5. The 9.5 was to tight in the toe box area. They are a long narrow shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Micbran

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable shoe made to last!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I wanted some everyday shoes that could be both snazzy and casual. I wanted shoes that would last longer than just a few months as I really wear out shoes. The leather is high quality and takes a bit to break in, but the shoes are comfortable and built to last. I did switch out the laces with something thinner and blue to add some contrasting color for fun and they look great. The shoes are a little more brown in real life than they are grey in the photos, but the color is a rich blend of grey-brown.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Koepnick

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous shoes! The quality is simply unmatched. ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous shoes! The quality is simply unmatched. I mean, really! These are quality shoes with style! Every pair I buy - FRYE.
customer_reviews.author: Theorist

customer_reviews.title: Color Difference!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice looking shoe. Very comfortable, however the there's a big difference between the color on the screen and what the actual color is. I ordered "fatigue" expecting brown, but the actual shoe is more of a dark green. Labeling on the shoe box and shoe both say "fatigue". Haven't yet decided if i'm going to keep or return.
customer_reviews.author: PaulM

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure I understand some of the reviews that the shoes are falling apart. I own about 8 pair of Frye shoes, including some boots and have never had a problem. I wear a size 13 and they are true to fit, and high quality leather. The leather is a bit stiff when new, as is all leather, so a few times of wearing them may be needed to break them in. Frye also sells their own leather shoe conditioner which I buy at a local Frye store that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hit and a Miss
customer_reviews.text: You definitely have to order a larger size in order to fit right, especially if you have a wider foot.
customer_reviews.author: Bill of Chicago

customer_reviews.title: they run a size small
customer_reviews.text: these are at least a half inch smaller than other frye models i have purchased in the past. buuuuuuutttt, they are great style and a great brand just too small!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - glued not sewn
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty bad quality as others have stated. Hard to believe they are actually Frye, which is a brand I typically associate with high quality. Don’t recommend these at all
customer_reviews.author: Catman

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these shoes are super, the fit they have to work on, low and narrow, toes hurts when you walk.
customer_reviews.author: Nitronic

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes but sides are becoming unstitched despite impeccable care.
customer_reviews.author: ufbilly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and expected a problem but had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Soles separating from upper
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are coming apart at the seam joining the rubber sole to the leather upper. I’ve had them 1 month and have only worn them a dozen times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It takes time break it because of the quality leather.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley G Barnes Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME shoes....love the look. Soles seem to be wearing pretty quickly at the heel...
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits and feels just how I wanted. I love this shoe! Thanks frye!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I've gotten a lot of compliments on these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: breaking apart after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these for a few months and they bottom sole is already detaching from the leather; very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: thedaminal

customer_reviews.title: Fit a little long
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great but I am a size 8.5 and the size 8.5 in this shoe feel too big. Going to exchange them for an 8.0
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look as good as they feel
customer_reviews.text: Frye makes some nice shoes and these are no exception. The classic sneaker design in suede with upgraded insole, rubberized and reinforced sole plus an extra pair of shoe laces (leather and standard) mean the attention to detail is built into each pair. Very comfortable without any need to break in, these feel as good as they look. The size is a bit odd. I found the overall fit good but there was extra space in the toe area - basically these shoes are "long" for the size.
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor sole construction
customer_reviews.text: Very poor sole construction: the rubber is separating from the leather in multiple places, after only a couple months of wear.
customer_reviews.author: feresjfe

customer_reviews.title: High quality sneaker with good support.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend going a half size larger due to smaller toe box (M width) Otherwise, they are 5 star. Great looking and obviously made with high-quality materials. My only gripe is that, for the price, they should be made in the United States where the company originated.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L

customer_reviews.title: simplistic and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish, and yet, very simplistic.... very low profile but comfortable if your not standing all day... very good workmanship, nice finish.... clean seams.... makes for nice casual shoe
customer_reviews.author: funbear

product_meta.title: FRYE Men's Brett Low Sneaker, Slate, 7.5 M
